asociate.title: Join Red Akasha
asociate.subtitle: Complete the form to join our community of artists and music industry professionals from Latin America.
asociate.successMessage: Your registration request has been sent successfully. Check your email to confirm your account.
asociate.profileSpecificationHint: Briefly describe your specialty or focus
asociate.uploadMediaDesc: Upload multimedia content for your profile

upload.title: Upload Content
upload.subtitle: Share your videos and photos with the Red Akasha community
upload.associationRequiredDesc: To upload content, you must first join the platform
upload.noProfileDesc: To upload content to the platform, you need to complete the association process and create your profile first.
upload.videoDesc: Share your music video, video clip, documentary or audiovisual content
upload.videoUploadDesc: Upload your video in MP4, WebM or MOV format (max. 500MB)
upload.customThumbnailDesc: Upload a cover image for your video (like YouTube). If you don't upload one, a frame from the video will be used.
upload.thumbnailDesc: 16:9 image recommended (1280x720 or higher). Formats: JPG, PNG, WebP (max. 10MB)
upload.photographyDesc: Upload photos from concerts, recording sessions or related graphic material
upload.photoUploadDesc: Upload images from events, backstage, album covers, etc. (max. 10MB)
upload.audioDesc: Share your podcast about production, marketing, copyright and more
upload.audioUploadDesc: Upload your audio file in MP3, WAV or AAC format (max. 100MB)
upload.monetizationDesc: Configure whether your content will be free or paid
upload.freeContentDesc: Content will be visible to everyone at no cost
upload.paidContentDesc: Users will need to pay to access the content
upload.previewDesc: This is how your content will look in the gallery:
upload.contentUploadedDesc: Your content is under review and will be published soon.
upload.enterTitleError: Please enter a title for the content
upload.uploadAudioError: Please upload an audio file for the podcast
upload.selectCategoryError: Please select a category for the podcast
upload.uploadMediaError: Please upload at least a video or a photo
upload.loginRequired: You must be logged in to upload content
upload.uploadError: There was a problem uploading your content. Please try again.
upload.selectTypePreview: Select a content type to see the preview
upload.enterTitlePreview: Enter a title to see the preview

forum.associationRequiredDesc: To participate in the forum, you must first join the platform
forum.noProfileDesc: To participate in the forum and collaborate with the community, you need to complete the association process and create your profile first.
forum.noCategories: No categories available yet. Administrators can create categories from the admin panel.
